full_text: This cute little Butterfly Knitting Pattern is a fun quick knit and great stash buster. Add knitted butterflies as embellishments to clothes, hair pins, notebooks, and more. Size: Approximately 3.25” wide x 2.5” tall with size 7US needles and worsted yarn. VIDEO TUTORIAL: For a complete step-by-step tutorial of this knitting pattern, you can watch my video on YouTube at Studio Knit. KNITTING PATTERN: http://www.studioknitsf.com/butterfly-knitting-pattern/ Printable requires mailing list sign-up. Website has entire written pattern, as well. MATERIALS: My butterfly samples were created with size 7 US knitting needles and worsted weighted acrylic and wool yarns. Feel free to use any size yarn, fiber, and needles for your creative project. • Yarn in any weight, fiber, & color of your choice • Knitting Needles sized appropriately for your yarn • Scissors • Tapestry Needle FINISHING Slightly fold bottom portion of wings overlapping top portion, tack with yarn to secure. Tack abdomen over center of wings, add antenna, weave in ends. Fly away!
name: Ravelry: Butterfly pattern by Kristen McDonnell
